Call BloquearCampos
End Sub
Private Sub BloquearCampos
Try
Dim MPBurden as EpiNumericEditor MPBurden = CType(CSM.GetNativeControlReference("baebae9d-cfb7-4383-8e77-80903db59a5d"), EpiNumericEditor) MPBurden.Enabled = False
Dim MPLabor as EpiNumericEditor MPLabor = CType(CSM.GetNativeControlReference("8f636524-cc9e-4f69-bd16-f3d4e243caf6"), EpiNumericEditor) MPLabor.Enabled = False
Dim MPMateria as EpiNumericEditor MPMateria = CType(CSM.GetNativeControlReference("7c44969f-30c7-499e-b31f-b1e535f6eb81"), EpiNumericEditor) MPMateria.Enabled = False
Dim MPSubContrato as EpiNumericEditor MPSubContrato = CType(CSM.GetNativeControlReference("334090ac-4b22-46f5-b0fc-c028c07c53be"), EpiNumericEditor) MPSubContrato.Enabled = False
Dim MPMtlBurden as EpiNumericEditor MPMtlBurden = CType(CSM.GetNativeControlReference("0915f6ac-bb5d-4622-aee7-2a80b44ed216"), EpiNumericEditor) MPMtlBurden.Enabled = False
Dim MPMiscCost as EpiNumericEditor MPMiscCost = CType(CSM.GetNativeControlReference("951685f2-b921-4478-ab97-a8efeeb585c3"), EpiNumericEditor) MPMiscCost.Enabled = False
'Factores Ensamble epiNumericEditorGastosDen.Enabled = False epiNumericEditorMObra.Enabled = False epiNumericEditorMPrima.Enabled = False epiNumericEditorSubContrato.Enabled = False epiNumericEditorGastosGM.Enabled = False
'Factores SubEnsamble epiNumericEditorSGastosDen.Enabled = False epiNumericEditorSMObra.Enabled = False epiNumericEditorSMPrima.Enabled = False epiNumericEditorSSubContrato.Enabled = False epiNumericEditorSGastosGM.Enabled = False
epiGroupBoxNuevosFactores.Visible = False
Catch ex As Exception MessageBox.Show(ex.Message) Finally
End try
End Sub
Private Sub FactoresEnsamble(ByRef _Level As Integer)
Try
pBar1.Minimum = 0 pBar1.Value = 0
Dim edvQuoteHed As EpiDataView = CType(oTrans.EpiDataViews("QuoteHed"), EpiDataView) Dim edvQuoteDtl As EpiDataView = CType(oTrans.EpiDataViews("QuoteDtl"), EpiDataView)
Dim _QuoteNum As String = edvQuoteDtl.dataView(edvQuoteDtl.Row)("QuoteNum") Dim _QuoteLine As String = edvQuoteDtl.dataView(edvQuoteDtl.Row)("QuoteLine")
Dim QuoteAsm As QuoteAsmAdapter = New QuoteAsmAdapter(Me.oTrans) QuoteAsm.BOConnect() Dim QuoteAsmDS As Erp.BO.QuoteAsmDataSet = New Erp.BO.QuoteAsmDataSet() Dim QuoteAsm1DS As Erp.BO.QuoteAsmDataSet = New Erp.BO.QuoteAsmDataSet() Dim QuoteAsm2DS As Erp.BO.QuoteAsmDataSet = New Erp.BO.QuoteAsmDataSet() Dim boQuoteAsmImpl As Erp.Proxy.BO.QuoteAsmImpl = DirectCast(QuoteAsm.BusinessObject, Erp.Proxy.BO.QuoteAsmImpl)
Dim Part As PartAdapter = New PartAdapter(Me.oTrans) Part.BOConnect() Dim PartDS As Erp.BO.PartDataSet = New Erp.BO.PartDataSet() Dim boPartImpl As Erp.Proxy.BO.PartImpl = DirectCast(Part.BusinessObject, Erp.Proxy.BO.PartImpl)
Dim PartCostSearch As PartCostSearchAdapter = New PartCostSearchAdapter(Me.oTrans) PartCostSearch.BOConnect() Dim PartCostSearchDS As Erp.BO.PartCostSearchDataSet = New Erp.BO.PartCostSearchDataSet() Dim boPartCostSearchImpl As Erp.Proxy.BO.PartCostSearchImpl = DirectCast(PartCostSearch.BusinessObject, Erp.Proxy.BO.PartCostSearchImpl)
QuoteAsmDS = boQuoteAsmImpl.GetRows("QuoteNum = '" & _QuoteNum & "' And QuoteLine = '" & _QuoteLine & "' And BOMLevel = '" & _Level & "'" ,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,0,1,Bolean)
Dim drED As DataRow Dim drED1 As DataRow Dim drED2 As DataRow Dim drED3 As DataRow Dim i As Integer Dim j As Integer Dim k As Integer Dim l As Integer
pBar1.Maximum = QuoteAsmDS.Tables("QuoteAsm").rows.count
For i=0 to QuoteAsmDS.Tables("QuoteAsm").rows.count()-1 drED=QuoteAsmDS.Tables("QuoteAsm").Rows(i) drED.BeginEdit()
Dim _CostMtl As Double = 0 Dim _SumaCostMtl As Double = 0
QuoteAsm1DS = boQuoteAsmImpl.GetRows("QuoteNum = '" & _QuoteNum & "' And QuoteLine = '" & _QuoteLine & "' And BOMLevel = '" & _Level & "'" ,param,param,"QuoteNum = '" & _QuoteNum & "' And QuoteLine = '" & _QuoteLine & "' And AssemblySeq = '" & drED("AssemblySeq") & "'",param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,0,1,Bolean)
For j=0 to QuoteAsm1DS.Tables("QuoteMtl").rows.count()-1 drED1=QuoteAsm1DS.Tables("QuoteMtl").Rows(j) drED1.BeginEdit()
PartCostSearchDS = boPartCostSearchImpl.GetRows("PartNum = '" & drED1("PartNum") & "'",0,1,Bolean)
For k=0 to PartCostSearchDS.Tables("PartCost").rows.count()-1 drED2=PartCostSearchDS.Tables("PartCost").Rows(k) drED2.BeginEdit() _CostMtl = drED2("AvgMaterialCost") Try QuoteMtl_EstUnitCost(drED1("PartNum"),_CostMtl,drED1("AssemblySeq")) Catch End Try
drED2.EndEdit() Next
If drED1("IUM") = "KG" Then '3 Decimales _SumaCostMtl = _SumaCostMtl + (_CostMtl * FormatNumber(drED1("QtyPer") * (1 + (drED1("EstScrap") / 100)),3)) Else If drED1("IUM") = "MT" Then '2 Decimales _SumaCostMtl = _SumaCostMtl + (_CostMtl * FormatNumber(drED1("QtyPer") * (1 + (drED1("EstScrap") / 100)),3)) Else '0 Decimales _SumaCostMtl = _SumaCostMtl + (_CostMtl * FormatNumber(drED1("QtyPer") * (1 + (drED1("EstScrap") / 100)),3)) End If End If
drED1.EndEdit() Next
QuoteAsm2DS = boQuoteAsmImpl.GetRows("QuoteNum = '" & _QuoteNum & "' And QuoteLine = '" & _QuoteLine & "' And Parent = '" & drED("AssemblySeq") & "'" ,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,0,1,Bolean) 'QuoteAsm2DS = boQuoteAsmImpl.GetRows("QuoteNum = '" & _QuoteNum & "' And QuoteLine = '" & _QuoteLine & "' And AssemblySeq = '" & drED("Child") & "'" ,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,0,1,Bolean)
For l=0 to QuoteAsm2DS.Tables("QuoteAsm").rows.count()-1 drED3=QuoteAsm2DS.Tables("QuoteAsm").Rows(l) drED3.BeginEdit()
_SumaCostMtl = _SumaCostMtl + drED3("FMPrima_c")
drED3.EndEdit() Next
drED("FMPrima_c") = _SumaCostMtl * drED("QtyPer")
drED.EndEdit()
If _Level > 0 Then boQuoteAsmImpl.Update(QuoteAsmDS) End If
pBar1.Value = i+1
Next
If _Level = 0 Then
Dim _CostTotal As Double = 0 Dim _Cantidad As Double = 0
QuoteAsmDS = boQuoteAsmImpl.GetRows("QuoteNum = '" & _QuoteNum & "' And QuoteLine = '" & _QuoteLine & "' And Parent = '" & 0 & "'" ,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,0,1,Bolean)
For i=0 to QuoteAsmDS.Tables("QuoteAsm").rows.count()-1 drED=QuoteAsmDS.Tables("QuoteAsm").Rows(i) drED.BeginEdit()
If drED("AssemblySeq") > 0 Then _CostTotal = _CostTotal + (drED("FMPrima_c")) Else _Cantidad = drED("QtyPer") End If
drED.EndEdit() Next
Dim cnn As New SqlConnection("server=" & _Servidor & ";database=" & _DB & ";uid=" & _User & ";pwd=" & _Pass & ";") Dim cmd as New SqlCommand
Try
cnn.Open() cmd.CommandText = "UPDATE erp.QuoteAsm_UD SET " & _ "FMPrima_c = " & (_CostTotal * _Cantidad) & " " & _ "WHERE ForeignSysRowID = (SELECT SysRowID FROM erp.QuoteAsm WHERE QuoteNum = '" & _QuoteNum & "' AND QuoteLine = '" & _QuoteLine & "' AND AssemblySeq = 0 )"
cmd.CommandType = CommandType.Text cmd.Connection = cnn cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()
Catch ex As Exception MessageBox.Show(ex.Message) Finally cnn.Close() End Try
End If
Catch ex As Exception MessageBox.show(ex.Message) Finally oTrans.Refresh End Try
End Sub

drED1.EndEdit() Next

Dim cnn As New SqlConnection("server=" & _Servidor & ";database=" & _DB & ";uid=" & _User & ";pwd=" & _Pass & ";") Dim cmd as New SqlCommand
Try
cnn.Open() cmd.CommandText = "UPDATE erp.QuoteAsm_UD SET " & _ "FMPrima_c = " & (_CostTotal * _Cantidad) & " " & _ "WHERE ForeignSysRowID = (SELECT SysRowID FROM erp.QuoteAsm WHERE QuoteNum = '" & _QuoteNum & "' AND QuoteLine = '" & _QuoteLine & "' AND AssemblySeq = 0 )"
cmd.CommandType = CommandType.Text cmd.Connection = cnn cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()
Catch ex As Exception MessageBox.Show(ex.Message) Finally cnn.Close() End Try
End If
Catch ex As Exception MessageBox.show(ex.Message) Finally oTrans.Refresh End Try
End Sub
Private Sub Factores
Try
pBar1.Minimum = 0
pBar1.Value = 0
Dim edvQuoteHed As EpiDataView = CType(oTrans.EpiDataViews("QuoteHed"), EpiDataView)
Dim _QuoteNum As String = edvQuoteHed.dataView(edvQuoteHed.Row)("QuoteNum")
Dim QuoteAsm As QuoteAsmAdapter = New QuoteAsmAdapter(Me.oTrans) QuoteAsm.BOConnect() Dim QuoteAsmDS As Erp.BO.QuoteAsmDataSet = New Erp.BO.QuoteAsmDataSet() Dim boQuoteAsmImpl As Erp.Proxy.BO.QuoteAsmImpl = DirectCast(QuoteAsm.BusinessObject, Erp.Proxy.BO.QuoteAsmImpl)
Dim Part As PartAdapter = New PartAdapter(Me.oTrans) Part.BOConnect() Dim PartDS As Erp.BO.PartDataSet = New Erp.BO.PartDataSet() Dim boPartImpl As Erp.Proxy.BO.PartImpl = DirectCast(Part.BusinessObject, Erp.Proxy.BO.PartImpl)
QuoteAsmDS = boQuoteAsmImpl.GetRows("QuoteNum = '" & _QuoteNum & "' And AssemblySeq <> 0",param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,0,1,Bolean)
pBar1.Maximum = QuoteAsmDS.Tables("QuoteAsm").rows.count
Dim drED As DataRow Dim drED1 As DataRow Dim i As Integer
For i=0 to QuoteAsmDS.Tables("QuoteAsm").rows.count()-1 drED=QuoteAsmDS.Tables("QuoteAsm").Rows(i) drED.BeginEdit()
PartDS = boPartImpl.GetByID(drED("PartNum"))
drED1=PartDS.Tables("Part").Rows(0) drED1.BeginEdit()
If drED("AssemblySeq") <> 0 Then
drED("FGastosGen_c") = drED1("FGastosGen_c") drED("FMObra_c") = drED1("FMObra_c") 'drED("FMPrima_c") = drED1("FMPrima_c") drED("FSubContrato_c") = drED1("FSubContrato_c") drED("FGastosGralesMat_c") = drED1("FGastosGralesMat_c")
End If
drED1.EndEdit()
drED.EndEdit()
boQuoteAsmImpl.Update(QuoteAsmDS)
pBar1.Value = i+1
Next
Catch ex As Exception MessageBox.show(ex.Message) Finally
End Try
End Sub

pBar1.Value = 0

msgbox(QuoteAsmDS.Tables("QuoteAsm").rows.count)

PartDS = boPartImpl.GetByID(drED("PartNum"))

If drED1("FGastosGen_c") > 0 And drED1("FGastosGralesMat_c") > 0 And drED1("FMObra_c") > 0 And drED1("FSubContrato_c") > 0 Then
If drED("BomLevel") = 1 Then 'Insertar datos directamente a DB a nivel 1
Dim cnn As New SqlConnection("server=" & _Servidor & ";database=" & _DB & ";uid=" & _User & ";pwd=" & _Pass & ";") Dim cmd as New SqlCommand
Try cnn.Open() cmd.CommandText = "UPDATE erp.QuoteAsm_UD SET " & _ "FGastosGen_c = " & drED1("FGastosGen_c") & ", " & _ "FGastosGralesMat_c = " & drED1("FGastosGralesMat_c") & ", " & _ "FMObra_c = " & drED1("FMObra_c") & ", " & _ "FSubContrato_c = " & drED1("FSubContrato_c") & " " & _ "WHERE ForeignSysRowID = (SELECT SysRowID FROM erp.QuoteAsm WHERE QuoteNum = '" & drED("QuoteNum") & "' AND QuoteLine = '" & drED("QuoteLine") & "' AND AssemblySeq = '" & drED("AssemblySeq") & "')"
dim query as string = "UPDATE erp.QuoteAsm_UD SET " & _ "FGastosGen_c = " & drED1("FGastosGen_c") & ", " & _ "FGastosGralesMat_c = " & drED1("FGastosGralesMat_c") & ", " & _ "FMObra_c = " & drED1("FMObra_c") & ", " & _ "FSubContrato_c = " & drED1("FSubContrato_c") & " " & _ "WHERE ForeignSysRowID = (SELECT SysRowID FROM erp.QuoteAsm WHERE QuoteNum = '" & drED("QuoteNum") & "' AND QuoteLine = '" & drED("QuoteLine") & "' AND AssemblySeq = '" & drED("AssemblySeq") & "')"
msgbox(query) cmd.CommandType = CommandType.Text cmd.Connection = cnn cmd.ExecuteNonQuery() 'oTrans.Refresh Catch ex As Exception MessageBox.Show(ex.Message) Finally cnn.Close() End Try
End If
valor = true Else msgbox("No Tiene porcentajes") valor = false
End If
drED1.EndEdit()
drED.EndEdit()

Next
return valor Catch ex As Exception MessageBox.show(ex.Message) return false Finally msgbox("carga lista") End Try

Private Sub epiButtonCalcular_Click(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal args As System.EventArgs) ' ** Place Event Handling Code Here **
Dim edvQuoteDtl As EpiDataView = CType(oTrans.EpiDataViews("QuoteDtl"), EpiDataView)
If (edvQuoteDtl.HasRow) Then
If edvQuoteDtl.dataView(edvQuoteDtl.Row)("OrderQty") > 0 Then
If edvQuoteDtl.dataView(edvQuoteDtl.Row)("SellingExpectedQty") > 0 Then
If epiRadioButtonC1.Checked = True or epiRadioButtonC2.Checked = True Then
If epiRadioButtonC1.Checked = True Then 'Calculo por ensamble 0 oTrans.PushStatusText( "Generando calculos en proceso...", False) pBar.Minimum = 0 pBar.Maximum = 13 pBar.Value = 0
LimpiarAsm0
If (FactoresEnsamble0) Then
pBar.Value = 1
FactoresEnsamble(10) pBar.Value = 2
FactoresEnsamble(9) pBar.Value = 3
FactoresEnsamble(8) pBar.Value = 4
FactoresEnsamble(7) pBar.Value = 5
FactoresEnsamble(6) pBar.Value = 6
FactoresEnsamble(5) pBar.Value = 7
FactoresEnsamble(4) pBar.Value = 8
FactoresEnsamble(3) pBar.Value = 9
FactoresEnsamble(2) pBar.Value = 10
FactoresEnsamble(1) pBar.Value = 11
FactoresEnsamble(0) pBar.Value = 12
CalculosAsm0 pBar.Value = 13 oTrans.PushStatusText( "Proceso terminado", False) oTrans.Refresh MessageBox.Show("El calculo a terminado exitosamente")
Else MessageBox.Show("El ensamble 0 no tiene factores") oTrans.PushStatusText( "Proceso terminado", False) End If Else 'Calculos por subensamble
oTrans.PushStatusText( "Generando calculos en proceso...", False) pBar.Minimum = 0 pBar.Maximum = 13 pBar.Value = 0
LimpiarAsm0
If (FactoresSubEnsamble1) Then
pBar.Value = 1
FactoresSubEnsamble(10) pBar.Value = 2
FactoresSubEnsamble(9) pBar.Value = 3
FactoresSubEnsamble(8) pBar.Value = 4
FactoresSubEnsamble(7) pBar.Value = 5
FactoresSubEnsamble(6) pBar.Value = 6
FactoresSubEnsamble(5) pBar.Value = 7
FactoresSubEnsamble(4) pBar.Value = 8
FactoresSubEnsamble(3) pBar.Value = 9
FactoresSubEnsamble(2) pBar.Value = 10
FactoresSubEnsamble(1) pBar.Value = 11
FactoresSubEnsamble(0) pBar.Value = 12
CalculosAsm0 pBar.Value = 13 oTrans.PushStatusText( "Proceso terminado", False) oTrans.Refresh MessageBox.Show("El calculo a terminado exitosamente")
Else MessageBox.Show("Un SubEnsamble nivel 1 no tiene factores") oTrans.PushStatusText( "Proceso terminado", False) End If
End If Else MessageBox.Show("Seleccione una opcion de calculo") End If Else MessageBox.Show("El campo SellingExpectedQty debe ser mayor a 0") End If Else MessageBox.Show("El campo OrderQty debe ser mayor a 0") End If Else MessageBox.Show("La cotizacin no tiene lineas para hacer calculos") End If
End Sub

pBar1.Maximum = QuoteAsmDS.Tables("QuoteAsm").rows.count
For i=0 to QuoteAsmDS.Tables("QuoteAsm").rows.count()-1 drED=QuoteAsmDS.Tables("QuoteAsm").Rows(i) drED.BeginEdit()
Dim _Sumatoria As Decimal = 0 _Sumatoria = (drED("FMPrima_c")) + (drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FGastosGen_c") / 100)) + (drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FMObra_c") / 100)) + (drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FSubContrato_c") / 100)) + (drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FGastosGralesMat_c") / 100)) epiNumericEditorSuma.Value = _Sumatoria ' epiNumericEditorCalc1.Value = drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FGastosGen_c") / 100) ' epiNumericEditorCalc2.Value = drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FMObra_c") / 100) ' epiNumericEditorCalc3.Value = drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FSubContrato_c") / 100) ' epiNumericEditorCalc4.Value = drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FGastosGralesMat_c") / 100) '
Dim cnn As New SqlConnection("server=" & _Servidor & ";database=" & _DB & ";uid=" & _User & ";pwd=" & _Pass & ";") Dim cmd as New SqlCommand
Try
cnn.Open() cmd.CommandText = "UPDATE erp.QuoteAsm_UD SET " & _ "CFGastosGen_c = " & drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FGastosGen_c") / 100) & ", " & _ "CFMObra_c = " & drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FMObra_c") / 100) & ", " & _ "CFMPrima_c = " & drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FSubContrato_c") / 100) & ", " & _ "CFGastosGralesMat_c = " & drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FGastosGralesMat_c") / 100) & ", " & _ "SumaCosto_c = " & _Sumatoria & " " & _ "WHERE ForeignSysRowID = (SELECT SysRowID FROM erp.QuoteAsm WHERE QuoteNum = '" & drED("QuoteNum") & "' AND QuoteLine = '" & drED("QuoteLine") & "' AND AssemblySeq = 0 )" cmd.CommandType = CommandType.Text cmd.Connection = cnn cmd.ExecuteNonQuery() 'oTrans.Refresh Catch ex As Exception MessageBox.Show(ex.Message) Finally cnn.Close() End Try
pBar1.Value = i+1
Next
'return valor Catch ex As Exception MessageBox.show(ex.Message) 'return false Finally
End Try

Private Sub CalcularPV
Try
dim valor as boolean = false
Dim edvQuoteHed As EpiDataView = CType(oTrans.EpiDataViews("QuoteDtl"), EpiDataView)
Dim _QuoteNum As String = edvQuoteHed.dataView(edvQuoteHed.Row)("QuoteNum") Dim _QuoteLine As String = edvQuoteHed.dataView(edvQuoteHed.Row)("QuoteLine")
Dim QuoteAsm As QuoteAsmAdapter = New QuoteAsmAdapter(Me.oTrans) QuoteAsm.BOConnect() Dim QuoteAsmDS As Erp.BO.QuoteAsmDataSet = New Erp.BO.QuoteAsmDataSet() Dim boQuoteAsmImpl As Erp.Proxy.BO.QuoteAsmImpl = DirectCast(QuoteAsm.BusinessObject, Erp.Proxy.BO.QuoteAsmImpl)
Dim Part As PartAdapter = New PartAdapter(Me.oTrans) Part.BOConnect() Dim PartDS As Erp.BO.PartDataSet = New Erp.BO.PartDataSet() Dim boPartImpl As Erp.Proxy.BO.PartImpl = DirectCast(Part.BusinessObject, Erp.Proxy.BO.PartImpl)
QuoteAsmDS = boQuoteAsmImpl.GetRows("QuoteNum = '" & _QuoteNum & "' And QuoteLine = '" & _QuoteLine & "' And AssemblySeq = 0",param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,param,0,1,Bolean)
Dim drED As DataRow 'Dim drED1 As DataRow Dim i As Integer
For i=0 to QuoteAsmDS.Tables("QuoteAsm").rows.count()-1 drED=QuoteAsmDS.Tables("QuoteAsm").Rows(i) drED.BeginEdit()
Dim _Sumatoria As Decimal = 0 _Sumatoria = (drED("FMPrima_c")) + (drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FGastosGen_c") / 100)) + (drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FMObra_c") / 100)) + (drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FSubContrato_c") / 100)) + (drED("FMPrima_c") * (drED("FGastosGralesMat_c") / 100)) epiNumericEditorSuma.Value = _Sumatoria
Dim cnn As New SqlConnection("server=" & _Servidor & ";database=" & _DB & ";uid=" & _User & ";pwd=" & _Pass & ";") Dim cmd as New SqlCommand
Try cnn.Open() cmd.CommandText = "UPDATE erp.QuoteAsm_UD SET " & _ "PorcUtilidad_c = " & epiNumericEditorUtilidad.Value & ", " & _ "CantUtilidad_c = " & drED("SumaCosto_c") * (epiNumericEditorUtilidad.Value / 100) & ", " & _ "PrecioVenta_c = " & drED("SumaCosto_c") + (drED("SumaCosto_c") * (epiNumericEditorUtilidad.Value / 100)) & " " & _ "WHERE ForeignSysRowID = (SELECT SysRowID FROM erp.QuoteAsm WHERE QuoteNum = '" & drED("QuoteNum") & "' AND QuoteLine = '" & drED("QuoteLine") & "' AND AssemblySeq = 0 )" cmd.CommandType = CommandType.Text cmd.Connection = cnn cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()
Catch ex As Exception MessageBox.Show(ex.Message) Finally cnn.Close() End Try
Next
'return valor Catch ex As Exception MessageBox.show(ex.Message) 'return false Finally
End Try
End Sub

Private Sub epiButtonActualizaFactores_Click(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal args As System.EventArgs) ' ** Place Event Handling Code Here **
Dim edvCurrAsm As EpiDataView = CType(oTrans.EpiDataViews("CurrAsm"), EpiDataView)
If (edvCurrAsm.HasRow) Then
Dim dialogResult As DialogResult = EpiMessageBox.Show("Desea actualizar los factores de la parte " & edvCurrAsm.dataView(edvCurrAsm.Row)("ParentPartNum") , "Actualizar factores", MessageBoxButtons.YesNo)
If (dialogResult = DialogResult.Yes) Then epiGroupBoxNuevosFactores.Visible = True Else epiGroupBoxNuevosFactores.Visible = False End If
End If
End Sub
Private Sub epiButtonActualizaNuevosFactores_Click(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal args As System.EventArgs) ' ** Place Event Handling Code Here **
Dim edvCurrAsm As EpiDataView = CType(oTrans.EpiDataViews("CurrAsm"), EpiDataView)
If (edvCurrAsm.HasRow) Then
Dim _GastosGen As Decimal = epiNumericEditorNuevoGastosGen.Value Dim _ManObra As Decimal = epiNumericEditorNuevoManObra.Value Dim _SubContrato As Decimal = epiNumericEditorNuevoSubContrato.Value Dim _GastosMat As Decimal = epiNumericEditorNuevoGastosMat.Value
Dim dialogResult As DialogResult = EpiMessageBox.Show("Se van a actualizar los factores en la parte " & edvCurrAsm.dataView(edvCurrAsm.Row)("ParentPartNum") & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _ "Gastos gen: " & edvCurrAsm.dataView(edvCurrAsm.Row)("FGastosGen_c") & " -----> " & _GastosGen & vbCrLf & _ "M. Obra: " & edvCurrAsm.dataView(edvCurrAsm.Row)("FMObra_c") & " -----> " & _ManObra & vbCrLf & _ "SubContrato: " & edvCurrAsm.dataView(edvCurrAsm.Row)("FSubContrato_c") & " -----> " & _SubContrato & vbCrLf & _ "Gastos grales. mat.: " & edvCurrAsm.dataView(edvCurrAsm.Row)("FGastosGralesMat_c") & " -----> " & _GastosMat & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _ " Desea continuar?" , "Actualizar factores", MessageBoxButtons.YesNo)
If (dialogResult = DialogResult.Yes) Then
Dim cnn As New SqlConnection("server=" & _Servidor & ";database=" & _DB & ";uid=" & _User & ";pwd=" & _Pass & ";") Dim cmd as New SqlCommand
Try
cnn.Open() cmd.CommandText = "UPDATE Erp.Part_UD SET " & _ "FGastosGen_c = " & _GastosGen & ", " & _ "FMObra_c = " & _ManObra & ", " & _ "FSubContrato_c = " & _SubContrato & ", " & _ "FGastosGralesMat_c = " & _GastosMat & " " & _ "WHERE ForeignSysRowID = (SELECT SysRowID FROM Erp.Part WHERE Company = '" & oTrans.session.CompanyID & "' AND PartNum = '" & edvCurrAsm.dataView(edvCurrAsm.Row)("ParentPartNum") & "')"
cmd.CommandType = CommandType.Text cmd.Connection = cnn cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()
MessageBox.Show("Proceso terminado, debe volver a calcular para que se actualice la informacin", "Actualizar factores")
Catch ex As Exception MessageBox.Show(ex.Message) Finally cnn.Close() epiGroupBoxNuevosFactores.Visible = False epiNumericEditorNuevoGastosGen.Value = 0 epiNumericEditorNuevoManObra.Value = 0 epiNumericEditorNuevoSubContrato.Value = 0 epiNumericEditorNuevoGastosMat.Value = 0 End Try
Else
epiNumericEditorNuevoGastosGen.Value = 0 epiNumericEditorNuevoManObra.Value = 0 epiNumericEditorNuevoSubContrato.Value = 0 epiNumericEditorNuevoGastosMat.Value = 0
End If
End If
End Sub
Private Sub epiButtonCancelarNuevos_Click(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal args As System.EventArgs) ' ** Place Event Handling Code Here **
epiGroupBoxNuevosFactores.Visible = False
epiNumericEditorNuevoGastosGen.Value = 0 epiNumericEditorNuevoManObra.Value = 0 epiNumericEditorNuevoSubContrato.Value = 0 epiNumericEditorNuevoGastosMat.Value = 0
End Sub
End Class
